[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ASTNode](./blockly.astnode_class.md) &gt; [createConnectionNode](./blockly.astnode_class.createconnectionnode_1_method.md)

## ASTNode.createConnectionNode() method

Creates an AST node pointing to a connection. If the connection has a parent input then create an AST node of type input that will hold the connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static createConnectionNode(connection: Connection): ASTNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  connection | [Connection](./blockly.connection_class.md) | This is the connection the node will point to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ASTNode](./blockly.astnode_class.md) \| null

An AST node pointing to a connection.
